content: mountain peak headband @knitbymary mary leblanc instagram @knitbymary ravelry knitbymary overview this is a headband knit in seed stitch seamed with a twist abbreviations k- knit p- purl co - cast on bobble - bind off * * - repeat between * specifications this pattern uses 50-70 yards of bulky weight yarn and us 10 5 6 5 mm needles i used lion brand hue and me in the color haze but you can use any bulky weight you would like keep in mind while making your yarn selection that this goes over your ears and forehead so something soft that won t irritate your skin is best gauge should be roughly 12 stitches and 20 row in a 4 x4 square in seed stitch final dimensions - 4 5 wide and 21 5 long 108 row long note if you would like your headband to be a bitthinner remove 2-4 stitches from cast on pattern using the long tail cast on co 13 stitches and leave a 6 tail for weaving at the end row 1 *k1 p1* k1 row 2 *k1 p1* k1 repeat until you have 112 row or have knit approximately 21 5 inches before you bind off wrap your headband around your head to make sure it will fit if it is too loose tink back or rip out row as needed too tight keep going in pattern until you get an appropriate length bobble and leave a long tail for seaming and weaving after bobble it is easiest to block before you seam to make sure you have nice even edges fold each end of your headband in half lengthwise and sandwich the two ends together making sure that the tail is on the outside of either edge as shown in the example below once your edges are lined up stitch them together moving back and forth until your tail & yarn needle have gone through all stitches then pull tight and weave in once you have finished seaming your headband nice and tight weave in any remaining ends then flip right side out and voila you may sell what you make with this pattern but please use your own photos and credit me for the pattern if you make this please share on instagram you can tag me @knitbymary or use the hashtags #knitwithmary or #mountainpeakheadband pattern support knitwithmary@gmail com
